sqlMap.select: SELECT ISSUED_SUPPLIES_GROUP1.*, SUPPLIES_GROUP1.ITEM_NAME, DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_NAME, CONCAT(SUBSTR(SMS_USERS_GROUP1.FIRST_NAME,0,1), SMS_USERS_GROUP1.FIRST_NAME) AS LAST_USER_NAME FROM ISSUED_SUPPLIES_GROUP1 INNER JOIN SUPPLIES_GROUP1 ON ISSUED_SUPPLIES_GROUP1.SUPPLY_ID=SUPPLIES_GROUP1.SUPPLY_ID INNER JOIN DEPARTMENTS ON ISSUED_SUPPLIES_GROUP1.DEPT_ID=DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_ID INNER JOIN SMS_USERS_GROUP1 ON ISSUED_SUPPLIES_GROUP1.LAST_USER=SMS_USERS_GROUP1.USER_ID ORDER BY ISSUED_SUPPLIES_GROUP1.ISSUE_ID

SELECT ISSUED_SUPPLIES_GROUP1.*, SUPPLIES_GROUP1.ITEM_NAME, DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_NAME, CONCAT(SUBSTR(SMS_USERS_GROUP1.FIRST_NAME,0,1), SMS_USERS_GROUP1.FIRST_NAME) AS LAST_USER_NAME FROM ISSUED_SUPPLIES_GROUP1 INNER JOIN SUPPLIES_GROUP1 ON ISSUED_SUPPLIES_GROUP1.SUPPLY_ID=SUPPLIES_GROUP1.SUPPLY_ID INNER JOIN DEPARTMENTS ON ISSUED_SUPPLIES_GROUP1.DEPT_ID=DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_ID INNER JOIN SMS_USERS_GROUP1 ON ISSUED_SUPPLIES_GROUP1.LAST_USER=SMS_USERS_GROUP1.USER_ID WHERE LOWER(SUPPLIES_GROUP1.ITEM_NAME) LIKE #itemName# ORDER BY ISSUED_SUPPLIES_GROUP1.ISSUE_ID
sqlMap.insert: INSERT into ISSUED_SUPPLIES_GROUP1 (issue_id, supply_id, issue_date, requestor, quantity, dept_id, last_user, last_update) VALUES(GROUP1_ISSUED_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #supplyId#, #issueDate#, #requestor#, #quantity#, #deptId#, #lastUser#, SYSDATE)

UPDATE ISSUED_SUPPLIES_GROUP1 SET supply_id = #supplyId#, issue_date = #issueDate#, requestor = #requestor#, quantity = #quantity#, dept_id = #deptId#, last_user = #lastUser#, last_update = SYSDATE WHERE issue_id = #issueId#
UPDATE SUPPLIES_GROUP1 SET ACTUAL_COUNT = (ACTUAL_COUNT - #quantity#) WHERE supply_id = #supplyId#
